llm_res.rule: MUST trigger when tokens are transferred, including zero value transfers. A token contract which creates new tokens SHOULD trigger a Transfer event with the _from address set to 0x0 when tokens are created.
The function `name()` should return the name of the token. This is an optional method but if implemented, it should return the correct token name.
The function `balanceOf(address account)` should return the actual balance of the account. The implementation should not modify the balance in any way.
